description: A walk around places in the City you might recognise (or not) from the silver screen. Visit the impressive sites used in major films, including Harry Potter, Mission Impossible, James Bond, and many more.

factsheet.heading: Film Locations of the City
paragraphs: The City of London’s iconic architecture – its unique mix of ancient and modern – makes it an ideal location for movie makers. It is home to some of London’s most famous and most filmed landmarks, including St Paul’s Cathedral and Tower Bridge (on the City’s border).

Join our qualified City Guide to explore the locations that make movie magic and reveal locations featured in movies and TV shows like Closer, Tomb Raider, Skyfall, Sherlock Holmes, Four Weddings and a Funeral, and Elizabeth: The Golden Age.
Please wear suitable footwear for a walk outside and bring weather-appropriate clothing.

images.title: A guide with Tower Bridge in background. Image: Niki Gorick Photography

travel_info: Additional travel info: Meeting point is front steps of the Royal Exchange.

name: Film Locations of the City
